name: Noroi E: The Origin
storyline: After the whole family dies in a strange explosion, the only living heir, aims to end the curse without expecting a radical twist in his story that would change his life completely.
summary: Psychological horror video game developed by CiberFly Interactive Studios, tells the story of a family that was faithful servant and direct descendant of the kings of darkness.
